phrases: If you are Type B, you need to take care.
If you continue to let it be, it could become a serious,
even life-threatening, situation.
Turn it off!
But this program will reveal the solution in one fell swoop!
This TV is sick!
It is really nothing to be scared about...
How about taking a bath?
Am I going to die too?
What are you talking about?
You are only 6 years old!
Sorry!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
Something is off.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
So, why?
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
as something never-ending.
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
See you later!
If I do not decide on the next nursery school soon, I will be up the creek!
I have heard that smart people enter huge companies
that have a day-care center on the premises.
But what country are we talking about here?!
Kawachi-san!
Hey!
Kawachi-san, did you get a girlfriend?
What?!
You are going home early all the time these days...
Well, it is not that.
You always used to take the last train, right?
And last year, sales went through the roof because of you,
but at this rate...
Those are not figures that can be made through just enthusiasm or tenacity.
I was lucky.
After all, my name's Daikichi...
Kawachi-san!
Wait!
I will take that.
Thanks!
You are going to the 4th floor, right?
Yep.
So you guys doing well, as always?
Not this year.
In fact, this guy was just putting the pressure on me.
Look how my hairline's receding.
After you have achieved results once, it is tough, huh?
Um, Gotou-san, you really have a child?
Just because I am short, you have doubts?
No, it is just you are so thin, I cannot imagine where you stored the baby...
I cannot remember anymore, either.
He is two already.
Thanks.
Just put'them down here.
I will go with you.
Oh, I can manage.
All right...
See you!
She is as powerful as ever, y'know?
If only Gotou-san had stayed in sales...
She is worked here years longer than me,
but after getting pregnant, she requested a demotion,
so she could go home at a set time.
Everyone in the company was talking about her...
How long are you going to take care of her?!
No time frame has really been settled on...
Rin-chan, huh?
She is been wetting the bed these days.
And I can tell that it really embarrasses her.
Maybe it is an emotional thing.
But you would be surprised how much kids sweat,
though not as much in the fall or winter.
The number of times they pee increases then.
I always used to be told...
Pee before going to bed.
Her mother must have had her reasons.
I would ask her if I could...
But mothers are important, are not they?
If you are any kind of man, never say die!
Hang in there!
What did you play today?
I read picture books... and had a staring contest...
Was it fun?
What is that for?
Rin, I am going to make dinner right away.
The moon's deflated, huh?
Mother-Child Health Record Book
Hello?
Well, how is it going?
I am fine, sure...
I am not asking about you.
Oh.
She is good.
Wait a second, I thought you did not want to be involved.
You are the one that is taking care of her,
so I cannot help but be involved.
I am going to try to find a clue about Rin-chan's mom this weekend,
so I will be out your way.
I see...
Then give me a call when you reach the station.
Make sure you dress that girl warmly enough.
Yeah...
I will invite Haruko, too.
It seems she is friendly with her girl.
We passed another car!
Looks like you are having a good time...
Yeah!
We are here.
Rin-chan, thank you for coming!
Hey!
I am sorry I do not have anything that would please a small child.
She likes old people stuff anyway.
Right?
Are you done already?
Yeah.
Do not come crying to me if you are hungry later.
I am stuffed...
I am sorry I could not finish.
I am home!
Sorry I am late!
That was awful!
What is with that annoying mother and child?!
Big brother!
You seriously took custody of this girl?!
Yeah...
And now the weather.
It is sunny and warm all over the country today.
Temperatures in all regions are about
2 degrees higher than average for this time of year,
making it pleasant weather everywhere.
I am just going to the bathroom.
And now let us look at the forecast for tomorrow.
I need to use the toilet!
I cannot go with you sitting there!
Is she always like that?
No...
She is a lot more talkative at home.
She even had fun on the train, acting like she was on a trip.
But waiting when we got here
were the people who were all uptight at the funeral.
What are you accusing us of?!
Dope.
If adults are in a bad mood, kids think they are the ones they are mad at.
You are right...
It may have been that way for you kids, too.
See?!
Insensitive as you are, you were the same way!
And Rin's smarter than you ever were!
Shut up, old man!
Rin-chan, you like cat's cradle, do not you?
Come on, at least answer.
Yeah...
I will give this one to you.
It is pretty...
Watch Aunty do it first, okay?
Aunty?
You mean Grandma, do not you?
You are not old enough to be my grandma!
My!
What a good girl!
It is because her standard for old age is crazy-high!
I will go first, so watch me!
Huh?
Did I do it wrong?
Huh?
This?
A 4-step ladder.
My!
A 2-step ladder.
An airplane.
A slide.
A diamond!
That is amazing.
It is easy to do it with this yarn.
Did you make this?
That is right.
I knitted it from thin wool.
Doing that makes it the perfect weight,
more than just making loops with woolen yarn.
I know!
Since she is good with her hands, I bet she can do beanbags, too!
You hook it around your little finger like this...
L-Like this?
Yeah, that is it!
One, two, buckle my shoe.
Three, four, knock at the door...
What is this?!
What the heck is going on here?!
What is this?!
Is not this what you wanted?!
Yes?!
Who is it?
Maybe Haruko-san.
Rin-chan!
These are pretty!
What do you call them?
They are beanbags.
Thanks for coming today.
You do it like this?
Like this?
No problem.
Like this.
And you sing a song as you do it.
I am really impressed that you can juggle working and raising a child.
It is hard!
My husband does not help in that regard at all.
Aunty taught me how to do it.
Who is your aunty?
Daikichi's mom.
Are you going to Grandpa's house from now?
That is not Aunty, that is Grandma!
Yeah...
I thought maybe I could find a clue to Rin's mother.
Is not this a pretty string?
That makes sense...
It is really easy to use.
After all, I think a mother is important.
Maybe I can do it good, too...
Go like this, then this...
Huh?
Strange...
Grandpa, you should have at least written a will.
Were not you worried about Rin?!
A modem?
I am back.
W-What is with that hair?!
She did it like Reina-chan's!
Come to think of it, those clothes too...
These are Kazumi's!
Mom, she cannot wear old, out-of-style clothes like that!
Look how nice she looks in them!
Well, I guess...
With her body type, they do become her.
This brings back memories.
So how was Grandpa's house?
These were from when you were 4, Kazumi.
I did not find a single clue.
I see...
Well, even so, we should not impatiently ask Rin-chan about this and that.
You are doing your best.
We may have never told you this...
After you were born, Mom worked.
She has not been a housewife the whole time...?
When she was pregnant with Kazumi,
she overdid it and had to be hospitalized for a while.
When she returned to work,
Mom found there was not a place for her anymore.
She was terribly depressed.
And Kazumi was so tiny when she was born...
Mom often took off work and came home early for you kids.
And what about Kazumi?
She made raising Kazumi her first priority,
so she ended up as you can see, arrogant and bossy!
How are you on time?
Do you want Dad to drop you off?
Nah, that is all right.
We will still make it in time if we walk.
Can we come back again?
She says, Can we come back again?
Aunty will be here waiting for you, so come back anytime.
Bye.
W-What are you talking about?!
What is wrong with wanting a grandchild?!
I would take care of the baby...
I cannot work and raise a child at the same time!
For a woman, that is a huge loss!
Besides, I still want to wear a swimsuit and go out drinking...
Hey, Rin, did Grandpa have a computer?
Do you know what a computer is?
Yeah.
Did Grandpa use it?
The maid used it.
He had a maid?
The maid's name was Masako-san.
Mother-Child Health Record Book Masako Yoshii
W-What was she like?
I do not remember so much...
I hate Masako-san...
She hated me and was always angry.
I was scared of her...
That is why I forgot about her.
I see.
It is a little late to be saying this,
but it is tough to work full-time and raise a kid, is not it?
You have got that right.
There is never a dull moment, that is for sure.
Um, have you ever thought that you were sacrificing yourself
by having a child, Gotou-san?
Are you referring to my change in position?
Sorry.
I know this is being rude, but...
Mmm, at the time, I thought that was the best choice,
and it turned out all right, so I have no problem with it.
But even if it was a sacrifice for me,
I would not want to talk about it.
Because words have a strong power, see?
What do some people say, the spirit of language?
Is that too abstract?
No...
I understand exactly what you mean!
Please tell me more about kids again sometime.
Kawachi-kun, your child is older than mine, is not she?
I want you to teach me, Senpai!
Rin...
You can wake me up.
But, it is sweat!
Whether it is sweat or whatever, it is fine.
Did you have a bad dream?
What is it like to die?
Daikichi, are you going to die before me?
Sadness about Grandpa's death...
Anxiety over what would happen if I died...
Fear of her own death...
She is not able to sort these out one by one, so she is all jumbled up.
Rin, everything will be fine'til you are a young lady.
When will I start to be a young lady?
I mean everything will be fine'til you are a middle-aged lady.
Until then, I am not going to die!
Count on it!
Okay.
And do not worry about wetting the bed either.
You will be fine as long as you go to the toilet before bedtime.
The toilet is scary!
I will go with you at night.
And if you still have an accident after that,
all we have to do is change your pajamas.
Will you be mad?
It is nothing to be mad about, and it is nothing to be laughed at.
Okay.
What did you want to talk to me about?
I am sorry this is so sudden, Hidaka-san...
Um...
This is out of the blue,
but please transfer me to a section that does not require working overtime!
What?
Kawachi...
Are you serious about this?
Totally serious!
I see.
So that is what is new in your life...
Personally, I think it is a real shame...
But I have got a kid, too.
Somehow, I will try to convince the section chief.
I am sorry.
But I really appreciate your help.
You do know the people under you will make a fuss.
I cannot understand it!
Why did it have to be you, Kawachi-san?!
Cannot you ask another relative?!
I cannot tell him that I insisted on taking her in myself.
And are not there nursery schools that will keep the kids'til late at night?!
I do not want to work for anyone but you, Kawachi-san!
Certainly, this is sudden...
But higher-ups often make sudden transfers.
So do not make a mountain out of a molehill!
But...
I really am sorry.
Even without me, my section will eventually get settled.
And they should be able to shuffle people around.
If not, there is something wrong with the organization.
But I cannot let Rin go on like this!
I do not think...
My line of thinking is not wrong...
Right?
Maybe...
Did you finish?
You want this much rice?
Yeah, that is perfect!
Admittance Guide
Towel, box lunch, slippers, toothbrush, cup...
With your name on everything!
Futon?!
Oh, that is only for the babies...
All right!
Daikichi, hurry up!
Right now, I could not state
This is not a sacrifice
without having it sound like a lie...
But I hope I will be able to think that way some years from now.
A sunny early Sunday afternoon
Let us go somewhere today
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I feel like dashing out
Sing, la, la, la
My voice out to forever
I am already high, high, high
Ride the dancing wind
Sing, la, la, la
My voice springs up
Rin, you have that same thing on your hand towel and lunch box...
What is it?
Like a dog with huge ears...
It is not a dog!
It is Lop Ear!
Lop...?
What is that?
A rabbit!
This is not a little dog?
It is a rabbit!
Jeez!
Rin, let us go pee.
I already went!
Is that right?
